text: I see the blog listing page has now been split into a module. Can I still loop through the first post and set as a featured post?

Yes, you can still do everything you used to do. We advise using a module for the loop now because blogs now support page editor editing. Using a module for your main blog loop enables you to provide greater control over layout and functionality to the content creator.
You can select any template under the private content settings for the login page.
